name: Ostend Air College (OAC)
about: Ostend Air College (OAC), located in Belgium, is a premier flight training institution with over 20 years of experience. As the first recognized training center for airline pilots in Belgium, OAC offers a variety of programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), as well as ab initio training. The college boasts a modern infrastructure and an impressive fleet, including the largest uniform G1000/G500 Glass Cockpit fleet in Belgium, along with Diamond DA40 and DA42 aircraft, and a simulator. OAC provides training to pilots who go on to work with over 40 companies worldwide, including renowned airlines. With a digital training management system through FlightLogger, OAC ensures a high-quality, fully digital experience for its students, instructors, and staff. OAC is committed to delivering the skills and knowledge necessary for a successful aviation career.
services:
["Airline Transport Pilot Course
Modular Training Courses
Flight Instructor Courses
Proficiency Checks"]
